author: wn.com
title: Natvie American Comedian to Perform in Pittsburg (City of Pittsburg, CA)
text: ( Source : City of Pittsburg, CA ) At first glance, Marc Yaffee is a comedian like any other. A man of three homes -- Los Angeles , Reno, Nev. , and the road -- he prefers to work his standup act in intimate venues where the crowd clusters close
